title: Technical Project Manager
description: Leading a CRM team of seven engineers. We implemented a trunk based CI/CD with feature flag option. We moved the legacy code from deprecated version to the LTS versions and we designed and developed new microservices deployed in ECS.

title: Senior Software Developer
description: Senior developer within a team of five engineers. We designed and developed the main API and connectors enabling interaction with an external API managing the insurance subscription process.

title: Senior Software Developer
description: Senior developer within a two-engineer team. We designed and developed an event-driven architecture enabling interaction with all APIs of the internal information system.

title: Technical Project Manager
description: Leading a team of six engineers. We designed and developed a microservice architecture for an ERP system in the healthcare field.

title: Technical Lead
description: Leading a team of three engineers. We implemented a POC for transferring code from SVN to Git and another one for migrating an AngularJS project to Angular code base.

title: Technical Lead
description: Leading a two teams of eight engineers. We designed and developed a microservice architecture for an energy certificate trade system and another system for managing the sick leave.

title: Software Developer
description: Within a team of three developers we designed and developed a supply chain management system and a E-Wallet mobile app.

title: Technical Project Manager
description: Leading a team of three engineers. We designed and developed a Point of sale system.
